code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Products.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Products=_ref=>{let{onCreateRequest,currentUser}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const features=[{title:'Create New Request',icon:'âž•',onClick:onCreateRequest},{title:'Request Management',icon:'ðŸ“',onClick:()=>navigate('/admin/requests'),adminOnly:true},{title:'Approval Workflow',icon:'âœ…'},{title:'Chemical Config',icon:'âš—ï¸'},{title:'File Attachments',icon:'ðŸ“Ž'},{title:'Status Tracking',icon:'ðŸ“Š'}];const visibleFeatures=features.filter(feature=>!feature.adminOnly||currentUser.role==='ADMIN');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"products",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"System Features"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products-grid",children:visibleFeatures.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`product-card ${feature.onClick?'clickable':''}`,onClick:feature.onClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"product-icon",children:feature.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:feature.title})]},index))})]});};export default Products;
